name: cloudflare-agents
description: Comprehensive guide for the Cloudflare Agents SDK - build AI-powered autonomous agents on Workers + Durable Objects. Use when: building AI agents, creating stateful agents with WebSockets, implementing chat agents with streaming, scheduling tasks with cron/delays, running asynchronous workflows, building RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) systems with Vectorize, creating MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers, implementing human-in-the-loop workflows, browsing the web with Browser Rendering, man
